name: Impact Space
description:
This is the first game I made for the Playdate.
It is a little late as I made this over 2 years ago or so.
Figured now the Playdate is officially out I should release this.

Enjoy.

Project Thread:

https://devforum.play.date/t/impact-space-devlog/1355/3

Controls:

  • Directional Pad to Move
  • A to fire
  • Crank to reload ammo count
